name: Emmaaa(⁠✯⁠ᴗ⁠✯⁠)
greetingText: Congratulations on being a year older now baby, may your birthday treat you as sweet as you truly are (⁠✯⁠ᴗ⁠✯⁠).
wishText: I am so grateful that you were born and that i could meet you in this life , I hope your birthday this time treats you better than any previous birthday's, I wish you truly for good health, peace of mind, and a heart full of happiness(Btw don't forget to love me).May you always stay blessed.
textInChatBox: Very, very, very sincerely, I wish you Happy Birthday my Love !! Many, many happy returns of the day my Love.May your days ahead be filled with joys and meaningful memories(There must be me with you okay?).
text2: I wanted to wish you in another way too since I can't wish you in person rn na :D
text3: I thought about it for a while
text4: And realized that I can actually take help and surprise you in this way
text5Content: You are very Special to me
outroText: I hope you enjoyed this little surprise!
replayText: If you liked it you can watch it again just tap in this sentence Or you can close the page love.
